description: The Irish county was previously on level two of the country's five-level alert system.
title: Coronavirus: Tighter restrictions announced for Donegal
title_page: Coronavirus: Tighter restrictions announced for Donegal - BBC News
maintext: The restrictions imposed in Donegal differ from the rules introduced in Dublin last week, whereby pubs which do not serve food will be allowed to stay open but will only be allowed to serve a maximum of 15 people and they must be seated outdoors.
